C

Cast - Class in entity
A Cast represents the actor/actress which belongs to a Movie a cast contains an integer ID, it's name and the corresponding Movie it belongs to.
Cast(int, String, int) - Constructor for class entity.Cast
Create a new Cast with the given name and movie it belongs to
Cast(String) - Constructor for class entity.Cast
Create a new Cast with the given name
CastController - Class in controller
This class represents the Controller for Cast It handles all database functions related to Cast database file
CastController() - Constructor for class controller.CastController

Change the MovieShowingStatus when today is or after the end date

Cinema - Class in entity
A Cinema which belongs to a Cineplex.

Creates a new Cinema with the with given attributes
CinemaClass - Enum Class in entity
Enum CinemaClass to represent the class of Cinema
CinemaController - Class in controller
This class represents the Controller for Cinema It handles all database functions related to Cinema database file
CinemaController() - Constructor for class controller.CinemaController
 
CinemaShowTime - Class in entity
A CinemaShowTime belongs to a Cinema with attributes of Cinema Code, Hall number, Cineplex, CinemaClass to represent the Class(Standard/Platinum), Showtimes of this cinema, which may have many showtimes in this cinema and SeatingLayout (The static representaion in text file)
CinemaShowTime(int, String, int, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, SeatingLayout) - Constructor for class entity.CinemaShowTime
Creates a new CinemaShowtime with the given attributes Must provide a Cinema and a Movie which belongs to Can be created/updated/removed by the Admin
CinemaShowTimeController - Class in controller
This class represents the Controller for CinemaShowTime It handles all database functions related to CinemaShowTime database file
CinemaShowTimeController() - Constructor for class controller.CinemaShowTimeController
 
Cineplex - Class in entity
A Cineplex which consists of at least 3 or more Cinemas with attributes of Cineplex Code, Cineplex Name, Cineplex located mall, Cineplex's address, Cineplex's distinct mall location e.g Level 5 West Mall Cineplex's nearest MRT station, and a list of Cinemas belonging in this Cineplex
Cineplex(String, String, String, String, String, String, ArrayList<Cinema>) - Constructor for class entity.Cineplex
Creates a new Cineplex with the given attributes
CineplexController - Class in controller
This class represents the Controller for CineplexController It handles all database functions related to CineplexController database file
CineplexController() - Constructor for class controller.CineplexController
